thread.title: Insider trading charges dismissed against Michael Steinberg, 6 others
thread.title_full: Insider trading charges dismissed against Michael Steinberg, 6 others

author: From cnn.com
title: Insider trading charges dismissed against Michael Steinberg, 6 others
text: From cnn.com It's a very big day for Wall Street. And a very bad one for the U.S. Attorney's office. The insider trading charges against Michael Steinberg, a former trader at SAC Capital, will be dismissed according to a statement released by the office of U.S. Attorney Preet Bharara on Thursday. In addition to the charges against Steinberg, who was convicted, six other witnesses, who pled guilty, will have the charges against them dropped. Steinberg was a portfolio manager at SAC Capital before he was convicted of insider trading in December 2013. In May 2014, Steinberg was sentenced to three and a half years in prison.
